CSSPrimitiveValueGetRGBColorValue.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The getRGBColorValue() method of the
interface is used to get an RGB color value. If this
CSS value doesn't contain a RGB color value, a is raised.
Modification to the corresponding style property can be achieved using the
interface.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSPrimitiveValueGetRGBColorValue.returns: An object representing the color value.
